messages.subject: welcome Sharon
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/28/03 4:24:12 AM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/28/03 4:24:12 AM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Thanks Ren.
My hair's pretty long and it would end up getting color all over my
clothes, that just wouldn't look so cool. >>

Well actually, it dries silly gurl! I've never had any get on my
clothes....and my hair was long until this week.

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are

----Frances Hodgson
Burnett

messages.subject: welcome Sharon
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/27/03 7:13:46 PM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/27/03 7:13:46 PM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< I always wanted pink hair since before Missing Persons
was popular, but never had the guts. >>

I have two words for you...HAIR MASCARA! It comes in lovely, brilliant
colors, doesn't cost much and you can change your mind.
I do blue and pink bits usually, but I can wash it out if I want a different
color or none at all! Fun.

Ren
"The world's much smaller than you think. Made up of two kinds of
people--simple and complicated.....The simple ones are contented. The
complicated ones aren't."
"Unschooling support at pensacolaunschoolers.com
